attributes.comment:
To Whom It May Concern,

This is in reference to U.S. Citizenship and Immigration Services, docket
number USCIS-2006- 0044. As an adoptive mother, I am writing to ask that you
please not raise the fees, specifically for processing the I-600A form/Petition
to Classify an Orphan. International adoption is difficult enough as it
is-emotionally and financially. We want to bring our children home! But this
is one more road block to making this happen if the fees are increased. For
many, adoption is the only way to have a family. Due to the politics in other
countries, re-accredidiation in Russia for example, many families (including us)
have had to re-apply for the form as it was about to expire. So, we had to pay
$545, twice-not something we planned on.

The Spirit of Adoption has captured our hearts and led us to another country.
Please don't add additional fees to the already difficult task of bringing these
children home. Thank you in advance for hearing our concerns!

Sincerely,
Adoptive Mom to one cute Russian Prince and paperchasing for our Polish Princess
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Anonymous
